column.name: question_text
column.value: What is React primarily used for?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "Database management", "B": "Building user interfaces", "C": "Server-side development", "D": "Machine learning"}

column.name: explanation
column.value: React is a JavaScript library primarily used for building user interfaces, especially for web applications.

column.name: question_text
column.value: What does JSX stand for?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "JavaScript XML", "B": "Java Syntax Extension", "C": "JSON XML", "D": "JavaScript Xtended"}

column.name: explanation
column.value: JSX stands for JavaScript XML and allows you to write HTML-like syntax in JavaScript.

column.name: question_text
column.value: Which method is used to render a React component?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "ReactDOM.render()", "B": "React.display()", "C": "React.show()", "D": "ReactDOM.display()"}

column.name: explanation
column.value: ReactDOM.render() is the method used to render React components to the DOM.

column.name: question_text
column.value: What hook is used to manage local state in functional components?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "useEffect", "B": "useState", "C": "useContext", "D": "useReducer"}

column.name: explanation
column.value: useState is the React hook used to add state to functional components.

column.name: question_text
column.value: When does useEffect run by default?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "Only on mount", "B": "Only on unmount", "C": "After every render", "D": "Only when state changes"}

column.name: explanation
column.value: By default, useEffect runs after every render (both mount and update).

column.name: question_text
column.value: What is a primary key?

column.value: {"A": "A key that opens the database", "B": "A unique identifier for each record", "C": "The most important column", "D": "A password for the database"}

column.name: question_text
column.value: What is a closure in JavaScript?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "A way to close the browser", "B": "A function with access to outer scope variables", "C": "A type of loop", "D": "A JavaScript library"}

column.name: explanation

column.name: question_text
column.value: What is the virtual DOM in React?

column.name: options
column.value: {"A": "A real DOM element", "B": "A JavaScript representation of the DOM", "C": "A browser feature", "D": "A database"}

column.name: explanation
